org.red5.io.mp4

Class MP4Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.io.mp4.MP4Frame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<MP4Frame>

    public class MP4Frame
extends Object
implements Comparable<MP4Frame>
    Represents an MP4 frame / chunk sample
    Author:
    Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
